messages.subject: Vancouver, WA Families?
messages.msgSnippet: We are new to the area and are looking forward to meeting other unschooling families. I have a 6 1/2yr old dd, a 2 1/2 yr old ds, and a baby due the beginning
messages.messageBody:
We are new to the area and are looking forward to meeting other
unschooling families. I have a 6 1/2yr old dd, a 2 1/2 yr old ds, and
a baby due the beginning of September. We were very involved with our
different homeschooling groups, playgroups and such in Orange County
and would love to start some new friendships in this area :) :)

Anyone with any information they wish to share???

Thank you so much!!

Ticia
